suite.name: Api Books

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Dado que eu tenha acesso ao Endpoint de Books
Log To Console

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://fakerestapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v1/Books path_url=/api/v1/Books headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'content-type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '205'} body=b'{"id": "987987987", "title": "Aprendendo Robot com o Neg\\u00e3o", "description": "Seja um automatizador fora da curva", "pageCount": "321", "excerpt": "Testando", "publishDate": "2022-10-16T11:01:21.168Z"}'

kw.name: Log To Console
